description: Students are introduced to a number of compositional techniques and apply them in creating original works of music and hearing them performed. Participants listen to important 20th- and 21st-century compositions, and discuss current trends in music, the changing role of the composer in society, and practical composition issues. Prerequisites: Music 112/114, or permission of instructor. Generally offered each semester.
name: Composition I
prerequisites: Prerequisites: Music 112/114, or permission of instructor. Generally offered each semester.
